Class: EventHistory

EventHistory()

Creates a motion history object. It stores motion messages in a list and provides the function to get a list of recent motions.

Constructor

new EventHistory()

Source:
  • eventhistory.js, line 29

Methods

addEvent(message)

Checks a message for motions and if a motion is included adds it to the motion list

Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Message

received message
Source:
  • eventhistory.js, line 77

clear()

Deletes all motion entries

Source:
  • eventhistory.js, line 69

getLatestEvents(relatedMotionTimespanInSecondsopt) → {Object}

Gets the last motion and all "related" motions. A motion is "related", if it happend nearly at the same time

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
relatedMotionTimespanInSeconds number <optional>
 5

time in seconds when a motion is a related motion
Source:
  • eventhistory.js, line 92
Returns:

{ timestamp, motions, displayString } timestamp is the latest motion, motions is an Object containing a map of topic: timestamp and displayString is a string to visualize the motions in a log

Type
Object
